description: The Taming of the Shrew is a comedy by William Shakespeare, believed to have been written between 1590 and 1594. The play starts with the Induction where a trick is played by a nobleman on the drunkard Christopher Sly who arranges for an acting troupe to perform a play called The Taming of the Shrew. In this play within a play, the focus is on Bianca, a beautiful young lady with many quality admirers including Lucentio, Gremio, and Hortensio, but Bianca's father is adamant that Bianca will not be allowed to marry until her older sister, Katharine, is at least engaged. Since Katharine has no interest, this is a problem for everyone.To have access to this classic masterpiece download our ebook today!
